description.en: Mini 4WD Fighter, the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.

title.en: The Diary About Ayame's Easygoing and Aggressive Days

altTitles.ja-ro: アヤメくんののんびり肉食日誌

description.en: The manga centers on Ayame and Tsubaki, who are researchers at a lab in the biology department of T University. Ayame is a "returnee." He does things at his own pace and is a "dinosaur otaku," and Tsubaki is his older colleague who is an enthusiast of studying the skeletons of birds and dinosaurs. The manga follows their slightly strange romantic relationship.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Learn Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhēn Bù Xiǎng Xué Jìn Zhòu
Wo Zhen Bu Xiang Xue Jin Zhou

description.en:
For Ning Feng, an infamous underachiever, this will be his third time taking the awakening exam.  When he awakens as a one-star -- the lowest possible rating -- everyone laughs.  He can't understand why his new skills talk about "forbidden spells" and "dark power."  
He isn't an evil dark lord, but wow!  Who knew forbidden spells could be so powerful!  These skills are so cool, but they emit tons of dark power. 
There's a new source of dark power in the city and Ning Feng must get stronger before anyone realizes that its him.

title.en: I Got The Weakest Class, Dragon Tamer!?

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：驭龙师是最弱职业？

altTitles.zh-ro: Quánmín Zhuǎn Zhí: Yù Lóng Shī Shì Zuì Ruò Zhíyè?

description.en: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title.en: The Youngest Disciple of the Martial Arts Leader

description.en: The strongest in the martial world, leader of the Hojeongdan, Lee Hwan! During a mission, he battles the Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Sect, Deung Gwang-cheon, and loses consciousness… When he opens his eyes, he’s at home? No… This is my childhood home? It’s hard to believe, but if I really have returned to the past, this time I won’t just stand by and do nothing! On the night of August 8th, when he was 17 years old, a sudden, splitting headache strikes, and something comes to mind. “Cheonsu Ilgi Hap (Thousand Hands One Energy Unification), Deukwon Gang (Obtain Original Strength)…” He muttered absentmindedly and then paused. “Wait, this is the Absolute Demonic Art of the Heavenly Demon! How do I know this technique? Am I going crazy?!”

We may be like this, but if we don't give up, we will surely reach the dream stage, Koshien!"

Jyosei Private Academy. After it changed its policy and became a cut-throat academic elite school, its once powerful baseball team has become weak with only four members left. However, baseball maniac Ruito Hibino has a secret plan!

Aiming for Koshien is an amateur tag-team of misfits!?

Straight from the bottom of hell!

A straightforward tale of baseball played by hated people!

The sacred heavenly gate looms high in the boundless sky, while the abyss of time and space wreaks havoc upon the world. As twelve spiritual springs rise from the earth and the moon slips beyond humanity’s grasp… where will our destiny lead? The realm of gods? The domain of demons? No, this is a world that belongs to humanity! I will claim the crown that no one else dares to bear and rise as the king of a new era. My name is Ren Jie, and to live is to be extraordinary!

A hundred years ago, “Mostro” began invading Earth from a mysterious otherworldly space that suddenly opened. During the long battle, humans with special abilities emerged. They came to be known as “Heroes” and fought against the Mostro to protect the world…

"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
description.fr:
« Ça peut être d'un bleu brumeux, mais c'est pas grave. »

Se déroulant un an après l'épilogue de "Seasons of Blossom", cette histoire se concentre sur la nouvelle ouverture du « Café Blossom and NEMONE Atelier », ainsi que sur la nouvelle camarade de classe de Bomi, « Pureum », alors qu'ils explorent une nouvelle jeunesse. Romance sur le campus, amours après l'école, romance au bureau, il y a de tout. La série réconfortante revient avec une nouvelle histoire pleine de jeunesse !

description.en:
Secretary Seo Yujin is in charge of self proclaimed truth-finding. Once upon she receives a sudden call to her president and she hears shocking news. She is asked to take full care of the president's younger brother and the third son of an unknown conglomerate, Jin Taeoh. What if you add something like this when you can't shake off an eery feeling? "It's not that difficult. You just need to keep him out of the media."

She should have run away immediately after hearing that, but blinded by the money, Seo Yujin agrees...! The first time she goes to the airport to meet him her first impression was that he's a quite beautiful... beast? Tame the world's just but heartless psychotic beast who doesn't know where to go!

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

altTitles.en: A Rough Lady Is All Bothered

altTitles.ja: あらくれお嬢様はもんもんしている

altTitles.vi: Nàng Tiểu Thư Cộc Cằn Lại Lỡ Một Nhịp Rồi?!

description.en:
Meet Tsubaki Kuchinashi, the Manhater Prince. Beautiful and popular, Tsubaki's core strength in high school comes from her position as the principal's granddaughter - suffice it to say, but any student or teacher who even looks at her the wrong way could be expelled at a moment's notice.   
  
Meet Tadashi Kiritsu, the head of the Public Morals Committee. As sharp and rigid as his glasses, Tadashi despises Kuchinashi's iron grip on the school. Naturally, a challenge to her rule bothers Kuchinashi, so she decides to get rid of him as soon as possible. Her plan? Get him in a honey trap. However, that's easier said than done, as she starts finding hidden aspects of herself that she didn't want to acknowledge, either to herself or to Tadashi.  
  
Will she prevail before her conscience eats her up from her own salacious taunts? Will Tadashi play into her hands? What manner of a person will he prove himself to be when facing her taunts?
description.ja: 私ばっかりもんもんするのは絶対おかしい‥‥。目障りな風紀委員・起立匡史(きりつただし)を退学させるため、口無椿(くちなしつばき)お嬢様はご自分のお色気でヤツを陥れることに。ですが、ナイスバディなお嬢様のお色気が起立に全く効きません。逆に、椿様の方がもんもんしてしまうのです。
description.vi:
Xin giới thiệu Tsubaki Kuchinashi: nàng hoàng tử "hận đàn ong," cháu gái của hiệu trưởng trường cao trung nơi chụy đang học. Vì thế, Tsubaki vừa có tiền, vừa có quyền, lại được xã hội (trong trường) trọng vọng (và tất nhiên là xinh đẹp nữa rồi). Ai dám động thủ với chị ấy (học sinh hay giáo viên) thì sẽ được cho đi T**** H** ngay tắp lự.

Phía bên kia có Tadashi Kiritsu: Cầm đầu ủy ban kỉ luật của trường, thanh niên nghiêm túc dốc hết công sức mình cho công cuộc trị an ở trường. Cũng vì thế mà Tsubaki mới thấy anh này "ngứa mắt" kinh khủng và muốn cho anh này bị đuổi học cho nhẹ nợ.

Vậy làm sao để có thể đuổi học được nam chính của chúng ta? Tsubaki cứ nghĩ là làm tí "mật ngọt chết ruồi" để nhử Tadashi vào bẫy là sẽ chắc kèo thắng. Nhưng người tính đâu bằng trời tính, qua những cái bẫy này, nữ chính của ta lại dần dà khám phá ra được những khía cạnh mới của bản thân mình và Tadashi mà chị ấy khó lòng chấp nhận được...

Rồi Tsubaki sẽ cắn rứt lương tâm trước vì những trò chơi khăm của mình hay là Tadashi sẽ mắc vào bẫy trước đây?

description.en: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…
description.pt-br: Você já se perguntou como é, de verdade, o garoto mais popular da escola? Acontece que ele pode ser tão desajeitado e tímido quanto qualquer um de nós. É o que Jayu Nam, uma garota discreta e reservada, começa a perceber depois de um encontro inesperado com Jahyeok Yeo, um colega de classe que parece ser bom em tudo na vida. Bem, quase tudo. Por trás do carisma de Jahyeok, esconde-se um super-introvertido que preferiria ficar em casa, mas sua aparência cativante sempre o empurra para situações sociais. Juntos, Jayu e Jahyeok começam a aprender um pouco sobre amizade e, quem sabe, algo mais…

title.en: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother

altTitles.fr: Je suis la mère du anti-héros

altTitles.pt-br: Eu me tornei a mãe do protagonista louco

altTitles.es: Reencarne cómo la madre del protagonista masculino loco obsesionado

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la madre del protagonista masculino que era un producto de desecho

altTitles.th: ฉันกลายเป็นแม่พระเอกนิยายจอมเสเพล

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち主人公のママになりました

altTitles.zh: 成为颓废文男主的妈妈

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

What’s the chance of running into your first love again after twelve years? This is exactly what happens to Solhui after attending her frenemy’s bridal shower. What’s more? Her first love is having an affair with a married woman. But that’s not all. She meets him and the woman again when she starts a viola lesson with a new student.

When CEO Jung Taeon mentioned he would stay for a month at Yeonghwadang, Sahee didn’t think much of it. He was merely a valued guest who would never get involved with someone as insignificant as her. However, the rude and endlessly arrogant man had a different perspective.

“Yeon Sahee, why don’t we sleep together?”

Sahee felt a mix of discomfort and unease, but his unpredictable demeanor continues to unsettle her..

title.en: Kyouiku Mama Saeko: Kono Ko no Tame Nara

altTitles.ja: 狂育ママ・サエコ─この子のためなら─

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyouiku Mama Saeko - Kono Ko no Tame Nara

altTitles.en: Saeko, the Education-Crazy Mom - If It's for This Child

description.en: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor, even if she has no education, even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter, Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter, who looks nothing like her, and today as well, she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.
description.ja: 紗江子は幸せだ。貧乏でも、学歴がなくても、シングルマザーでも。ただ一人、娘の唯さえいれば。美しい紗江子は全く似ていないブサイクな娘を溺愛し、娘のために今日も幸せをかき集める——どんな手を使っても…。

altTitles.ja: アネモネは熱を帯びる

description.en: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?
description.id: Nagisa Ootsuki melepaskan dirinya yang dulu karena malu karena gagal dalam ujian masuk sekolah menengahnya. Pada hari pertamanya di sekolah menengah barunya, siapa yang dia temui selain gadis yang membuatnya gagal dalam ujian! Bagaimana Nagisa menghadapi emosi yang rumit ini?
description.ja: 不本意ながらも進学した高校で凪紗が出会ったのは病弱な少女 茉白。初対面であるはずの彼女は凪紗が受験に失敗した原因とも言える少女だった…。自分を変える為、凪紗は茉白を「好き」になろうと決意する。
description.pt: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de chumbar nos exames de admissão ao liceu. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a rapariga que a fez chumbar no exame! Como é que Nagisa lida com estas complicadas emoções?
description.pt-br: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de reprovar no exame de admissão ao Ensino Médio. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a menina que a fez falhar na prova! Como Nagisa lidará com estas emoções complicadas?

description.en:
Hyogo Kanbayashi, a coastal lifeguard, works to enter Tokkyuu, an elite lifeguard team.


---

- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Tokkyu!**

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ja: 人類の守護者・竜神戦隊ドラゴンキーパーVS.世界征服を企む悪の軍団・怪人。彼らは互いの存亡を懸け、死闘を繰り広げ続けている！！……というのは、やらせの茶番劇。他の星から侵略してきた怪人達は、わずか１年で屈服。民衆の前で敗北を演じ続ける道化と化していた！悪者にすらなれず、隷従させられ続ける日々。そんな状況を覆すべく、一人の怪人が最強の大戦隊を相手に反旗を翻す！
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

description.en:
Taepyeong, a promising surgery professor, was reborn in the 19th-century English countryside village of Upton, retaining all of his memories from his past life.

He once again nurtured his dream of becoming a doctor. However, he was only met with...

The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
description.ja: （自称）不良高校生、風紀委員長にコヒュらされる日々!?※「コヒュ-る」【動詞】…驚きやときめきによって息がコヒュッとなる。【あらすじ】風紀委員長・亜鳥に憧れ、気を引きたい一心でなぜか不良を目指すことにした高校一年生・優。しかしワルくてカッコいいところをアピールするはずが、天真爛漫で人たらしな亜鳥の言動に小動物のごとく翻弄される…!?

description.en: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!

After her parents died, Sami gave up her life of fortune to live independently, doing odd jobs to make ends meet. When she starts to get involved with two of the most popular boys at her high school, Sami faces twists and turns -- Chan is her neighbor, and Pyojun makes her have conflicted feelings. Things get more complicated when she finds out that Chan has feelings for Pyojun as well! With her mom’s only keepsake in hand to keep her feet on the ground, Sami navigates obstacles that she wasn’t prepared for -- and aren’t even in her budget!

Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?

title.en: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu

altTitles.ja: この会社に好きな人がいます

altTitles.en: I Have a Crush at Work

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhè gōngsī yǒu wǒ xǐhuān de rén

altTitles.th: บริษัทนี้มีความรัก

altTitles.en: At This Company Is The Person I Like
The Person I Like Works at the Same Company
The Person I Like Is At This Company

description.en:
_"Why don't the two of us date? …In secret"_
 
Tateishi, who works in accounting at a snack-making company, has a secret. That secret is the existence of his cute lover that he's had since yesterday. Why keep it a secret, you ask? Because his lover is his unyielding colleague from the planning department of the same company— Mitsuya!
 
A pure office romance story about a couple who started their relationship in secret, and want to keep it that way!
description.es: ¿Por qué no salimos los dos ...? En secreto" Tateishi, que trabaja en contabilidad en una empresa de fabricación de bocadillos, tiene un secreto. Ese secreto es la existencia de su amante lindo que ha tenido desde ayer. ¿Por qué mantenerlo en secreto, preguntas? Porque su amante es su inquebrantable colega del departamento de planificación de la misma compañía: ¡Mitsuya! ¡Una historia pura de romance de oficina sobre una pareja que comenzó su relación en secreto y quiere mantenerla así!
description.ja: 「俺たち、付き合わない？……内緒で」お菓子メーカーの経理部に勤めるアラサー男子・立石には、秘密があった。それは、昨日できたばかりの、かわいい恋人の存在。なぜなら相手は、同じ会社の企画部で働く勝気な同期女子・三ツ谷だから――！　してないひとも、あこがれてるひとも、迷惑してるひとも、きっと言いたいことがある。ちょっとは覗いてみたくなる。秘密厳守のピュア社内恋愛ストーリー！
description.es-la: ¿Por qué no salimos los dos ...? En secreto" Tateishi, que trabaja en contabilidad en una empresa de fabricación de bocadillos, tiene un secreto. Ese secreto es la existencia de su amante lindo que ha tenido desde ayer. ¿Por qué mantenerlo en secreto, preguntas? Porque su amante es su inquebrantable colega del departamento de planificación de la misma compañía: ¡Mitsuya! ¡Una historia pura de romance de oficina sobre una pareja que comenzó su relación en secreto y quiere mantenerla así!
description.pt-br:
"Por que nós dois não namoramos? ... Em segredo"
  
Tateishi, que trabalha na contabilidade de uma empresa que faz lanches, tem um segredo. Esse segredo é a existência de sua amante fofa que ele teve desde ontem. Por que manter isso em segredo, você pergunta? Porque sua amante é sua colega inflexível do departamento de planejamento da mesma empresa - Mitsuya!
  
Uma história de puro romance de escritório sobre um casal que começou seu relacionamento em segredo e quer mantê-lo assim!

description.en: I was living a life of a NEET, and I was supposed to have died suddenly because of my daily indolence - but when I woke up, I had become a baby. It seems that I was reincarnated in another world where magic exists. I was born the son of a lord in a remote village, and began to lead a second life with my beautiful mother Kara, my big-breasted maid and nanny Ruina, and my beautiful sister Amelia, who is not related to me by blood. As a teenager, I've grown up and enjoy my daily life in a different world using my top-level magical ability and modern knowledge...?
description.ja: ニート生活を送っていた俺は、日頃の不摂生が祟り突然死したはずだった――が、目覚めたら赤ちゃんになっていた。どうやら魔法の存在する異世界に転生したらしい。辺境の村の領主の息子として生まれた俺は、美しい母親のカーラ、巨乳のメイド兼乳母ルイーナ、血の繋がらない美人妹アメリアらに囲まれて第二の人生を歩んでいく。成長した俺は、10代にして異世界トップレベルの魔力量と現代知識を駆使して、異世界での日常を楽しむが……!?
description.pt-br: Eu estava vivendo uma vida de NEET e deveria ter morrido de repente por causa de minha indolência diária - mas quando acordei, havia me tornado um bebê. Parece que reencarnei em outro mundo onde existe magia. Nasci filho de um senhor em uma aldeia remota e comecei a levar uma segunda vida com minha linda mãe Kara, minha empregada de seios grandes e babá Ruina, e minha linda irmã Amelia, que não é parente de mim. Como um adolescente, eu cresci e aproveitei minha vida diária em um mundo diferente usando minha habilidade mágica de nível superior e conhecimento moderno...?

title.en: The Spy Life in the Demonic Sect

altTitles.en: A Spy's Survival in the Demonic Cult

description.en: Jang Yiseo, a spy from the Murim Alliance who infiltrated the Demonic Cult, was given his first and last mission. To make the notoriously unruly Seventh Young Master, Ma-oh, the Vice Cult Leader! Despite his extraordinary martial prowess, Yiseo’s potential was hindered by his frail constitution. Meanwhile, Ma-Oh, a prodigious yet unpredictable force, walked the fine line between genius and madness. As their fates intertwined, the two had to navigate treachery, power struggles, and the ever-present risk of exposure. Can Jang Yiseo make Ma-Oh rise to the rank of being second only to the Cult Leader, or will the shadows consume them first?

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
description.ja:
真の救済が記されてるという経典を得るため、孫悟空・猪八戒・沙悟浄を共にし、天竺を目指す三蔵法師。

その道のりで襲いかかる試練が
・・・・・・・・全部エロい。

仏の道に生きる三蔵にとっては貞操を失うこと、それ即ち死。果たして三蔵法師は煩悩に打ち克ち、貞操を守り抜けるのか？

description.en:
Inept at dealing with people, Hikawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?! The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raw:** [Shounen Jump+](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/14079602755350023318)
- [Official X](https://x.com/ramparts_ice)
- [Official Anime Site](https://korinojoheki-pr.com/)

title.en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

altTitles.en: The Great Witch War: 32 Genius Witches Kill Each Other
The War of Greedy Witches: 32 of the Wickedest Women Duel to the Death

description.en:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171)
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: オトナを知りたい女友達
My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

title.en: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World's Top Ten Masters

description.en:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.

title.en: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!

altTitles.zh: 我靠无敌被动打出成吨伤害！

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Kao Wudi Beidong Dachu Cheng Dun Shanghai!
Wǒ Kào Wúdí Bèidòng Dǎchū Chéng Dūn Shānghài!

description.en: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.
description.zh: 前一世，程谦墨在游戏《天启》获得了全职业神职称呼，即将站上世界之巅，但在距离游戏第一人仅有一步之遥时，遗憾败北。可世界给了程谦墨第二次的机会，让他意外穿越到了一个设定竟然与《天启》一模一样，全民转职的世界。拥有全职业神级称号的他，决定完成曾经的遗憾，走上一条从未有人走过的道路。

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.en: Ma'am, Your Mask Has Fallen Off Again

description.en:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…

title.en: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru: Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujotachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu

altTitles.ja: 無駄だと追放された【宮廷獣医】、獣の国に好待遇で招かれる～森で助けた神獣とケモ耳美少女達にめちゃくちゃ溺愛されながらスローライフを楽しんでる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru ~Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujo-tachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu~

altTitles.en: Banished by the [Royal Court] After Being Told I Was Useless, I Got Invited to the Beast Country Promising Good Treatment: Enjoying a Slow Life While Being Doted on by the Divine Beast and the Animal-Eared Beauties I Saved in the Forest

description.en:
One day, veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with nowhere to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. 

After Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. 

From Let's Become a Novelist! comes the he long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!

(Source: Bookwalker)
description.ja: ある日突然国王からクビを宣告された獣ノ医師・ジークは、行く当てがなくなり途方に暮れるが、神獣を助けたことにより超好待遇で獣人国に招かれることになる。そしてジークを追放したことで衰退が始まる国を尻目に、ケモ耳美少女たちに囲まれた幸せな日々が始まるのであった――。「小説家になろう」発!もふもふ×ケモ耳美少女凝縮で大人気のハーレムスローライフが待望のコミカライズ!!

description.en: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
description.zh: 末日来袭，植物与水源全部枯竭。世界陷入恐慌，食物与生存再次成为人们最关心的话题。米面成为奢侈品，菜蔬更是有价无市！然而就在此时，有人在网站上发送一段视频，令世界震撼。甘甜的菜蔬滚入火锅中，散发诱人的绿色！烤的金黄的羊腿滋滋冒油！鲜美的鱼汤炖的宛若牛奶一般纯白！一旁的小女孩哀求道：哥，我真的吃不下了！

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

description.en:
By chaos, the world began to be invaded.

One day, gates suddenly appeared in the world, unleashing monsters upon humanity.

The situation brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

The martial world of “Eun,” the world of magic and knights “Einhart,”

and the world of demons “Gehenna” became interconnected, and superhumans from these worlds swept away the monsters.

However, they were not righteous saviors.

Under the law of survival of the fittest, the newly emerged “Players” of Earth were oppressed.

Lee Ro-Woon sought to mediate between the Players and the superhumans from other worlds, aiming to bring peace to the world.

But due to the discomfort of the superhumans from other worlds with his actions and the betrayal of his comrades,

Lee Ro-Woon lost everything and fell into ruin.

At the moment he was about to give up everything, he became the vessel of chaos and was transported to a sealed world.

There, he encountered three supreme beings.

Lee Ro-Woon becomes the disciple of the Three Kings and rises to rule over everything!

High-school student Yota Moteuchi is so unpopular that his classmates have given him the nickname "Dateless." So it's no surprise when the love of his life, Moemi, is not interested in Yota but instead is in love with Yota's best friend, Takashi. Yota turns to a video rental shop for comfort, but little did he suspect that the shop was magical and that the cute girl on his rented tape would pop out of the television and try to fix his ruined love life!

title.en: A Girl Who Sees Through The Kindness That Derives From Sexual Desire

altTitles.ja: 性欲由来の優しさ見抜き女子

altTitles.ja-ro: Seiyoku Yurai no Yasashisa Minuki Joshi

title.en: I Will Be a Black Lotus in My Next Life

altTitles.ja: 悪女の仮面 転生罪妻の復讐

altTitles.zh: 转生誓做黑莲花，罪妻要复仇

description.en: A trap carefully designed by her best friend turned Wangshu from a sweet wife into a prisoner? After being wrongly killed, she was reincarnated in the body of her best friend's depressed sister Suya! She vowed to make the mastermind pay a terrible price at all costs, save the family business and regain happiness!

In 1946, someone discovered an island where dinosaurs had survived into the present. Through breeding and genetic manipulation, humans managed to increase their population and supercharge their popularity! Until, well... the unfortunate accident, when people's attitudes soured on the idea of visiting dinosaurs. This story follows a rookie zookeeper who is newly hired at Enoshima Dinoland, a struggling dinosaur sanctuary, and the fascinating creatures who need specialized love and care!
description.eu:
1946an irla batean dinosauro biziak aurkitu zirenetik, ugalketa programek eta edizio genetikoek narrasti galduak erabat berreskuratzea lortu zuten.
Haien presentzia ikaragarriak mundu osoko jendea xarmatu zuen, baina istripu batez geroztik fokuetatik urrun gelditu dira.
Halako egun batez, Suzume Suma zaintzaile gisa hasi da gainbeheran dagoen Enoshima Dinoland dinosauro parkean.

Iturria: Harriet Ediciones
description.vi: Vào năm 1946, có người phát hiện ra một hòn đảo nơi khủng long đã sống sót cho đến hiện tại. Thông qua việc lai tạo và biến đổi gen, con người đã có thể gia tăng dân số và tăng cường sự nổi tiếng của chúng! Cho đến khi, ừm... một tai nạn đáng tiếc, khi thái độ của mọi người trở nên tệ hơn với ý tưởng đến thăm khủng long. Câu chuyện này kể về một người trông coi sở thú mới vào nghề, người mới được thuê tại Enoshima Dinoland, một khu bảo tồn khủng long đang gặp khó khăn, và những sinh vật hấp dẫn cần tình yêu thương và sự chăm sóc đặc biệt!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.
